resources.string: Buy on Steam
Overview
A new Main Story Questline!
Newly Revamped Zone: the Elysian Wilds!
A new weapon to choose: the Flail!
Level Cap increase to 65!
New Feature: Mounts!
Mounts
Play through a new quest series!
Two race types: Rallies and Tours!
Custom skins to personalize your Mount!
Ride swift Horses, cunning Dire Wolves, or mighty Lions!
Flail
Melee Support and Utility-style weapon
New possible weapon pairings!
Outlast your foes and support your allies!
Search for new gear and items for your builds!
Elysian Wilds
Discover the fate of First Light with Morgaine
Reimagined zone provides new enemies and challenges!
New Expedition: the Savage Divide!
Level Cap Increase
Increased Gear Score!
New Housing and expanded Storage!
New challenges in PvE and PvP!
Congratulations on purchasing the new expansion, Rise of the Angry Earth!
Your level cap has been increased to 65, and your skill cap has increased to 250.
Morgaine is investigating the Angry Earth presence in First Light and needs your help!
The objective "<font color={objectiveColor}>The Invasion of Artemis</font>" is now available.
The objective "<font color={objectiveColor}>The Invasion of Artemis</font>" will be available at level 60.
Mounts have arrived in Aeternum! Seek out Jochi Khan in Everfall to begin your training!
The objective "<font color={objectiveColor}>My Kingdom For a Horse</font>" is now available.
The objective "<font color={objectiveColor}>My Kingdom For a Horse</font>" will be available at level 25.
You can now use the Flail, a one-handed support and utility weapon that allows the use of a shield. Find or craft one to get started!
